Statute.Title: Government Organization Act (Federal Agencies) (see Dept. by name)
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Organisation du gouvernement (organismes fédéraux), Loi sur l’)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1995, c. 29, ss. 7 and 8 deemed in force 20.03.95 see s. 86(2); ss. 76 to 85 deemed in force 01.04.95 see s. 86(3); ss. 1 to 3, 6, 9 to 22, 24 to 31 and 33 to 75 in force 01.11.95 see SI/95‑115; ss. 4 and 5 in force 01.01.96 see SI/95‑115; ss. 23 and 32 in force 01.04.96 see SI/95‑115
